string.text: You're chained up naked for all to see as potential buyers grope and prod you, sticking fingers in your mouth and up your cunt and ass. One of the guards appears to have caught up to you with commendable speed, and whispers menacingly that seeing as how you're such a clever little whore he'll be sure to give you extra special attention from now on...

The caravan guard's sinister grin betrays their intentions as they inform their employer of your presence, sealing your fate as a piece of merchandise to be auctioned off. Chained and helpless, you await the highest bidder, the sound of cruel laughter echoing in your ears.
Maybe that was a terrible idea...

As you plot your daring getaway, a group of remarkably cautious guards nearly spoils your plans. You expertly toss a well-aimed rock into an adjacent room, distracting the guards and diverting their attention away from your fleeing figure. Only when you've put a considerable distance between yourself and the guards can you finally allow yourself a moment to relax. The overwhelming wave of relief floods your senses, embracing you like a warm embrace, reminding you that freedom, is a truly precious gift.
